tasks.task: Create a green ceiling using Devil's Ivy.
subtasks: Plan the ceiling installation.
Determine the appropriate plant.
Prepare the ceiling structure.
Install fishing line or rope grid.
Attach vines to the grid.
Maintain the plant for growth and care.
Address yellowing leaves and prune as needed.
Transplant broken leaves topot to regrow vines.
